Well, I guess they are rated at an average of 2.6 stars for a reason. I did my MRI on 11-Feb-25, 5pm. I was told MRI report would be sent to me the next working day. Guess what? It‚Äôs 14-Feb-25 and my doctor‚Äôs follow-up appointment is happening within an hour and I have yet to receive my MRI report! Had to call up their hotline just to get them to rush out the MRI report. How accurate can that report be if they have got to rush it out? Absolutely disgraceful service quality. Ludicrous. Period.

Update: They deducted $300 from my CPF-Medisave on 20-Feb-2025. It‚Äôs 10-March-2025 now and I‚Äôve yet to receive $300 from them. Not even sure why they‚Äôre withholding funds that are rightfully not theirs!

My ultrasound scan was done by ms Julia and she was gentle and assuring. Appreciate that the gel was warmed for patient's comfort. Waiting time was reasonable (about 10min?).
Overall a pleasant experience.

We got MRI appointment at 3pm but we waiting almost 2hrs . Actually transfer from SGH maybe SGH no slot for MRI . I asked officer why need to wait so long time . They told me because equipment got problem. Another patient also told me his appointment is 2pm and almost waiting for 3hrs . Really surprise royal medial service is so bad and unacceptable .

Had 2 pm appointment, waited until 3:15pm for the machine to warm up. When I asked why didn‚Äôt the nurse turn on the machine earlier, the answer was they were not sure if the patient would turn up‚Ä¶ what‚Äôs the point of having medical appointment if they wait for the patient to turn up at the door to start anything? Ridiculous

Not forget to mention they also charge $1400 for a treadmill ESG test, there are better private clinics elsewhere for better service and cheaper price

Nice and beautiful health care...friendly and very helpful staffs...from front desk to MRI scanning...very fast service...
Come earlier than appointment time to avoid delays and waiting...
Salute to all staff...very clean environment.
